title: FPS with random levels
description: First Person Shooter with Procedurally Generated Levels made on Unity. Rooms are generated in a grid using custom level generator. Some rooms are using Perlin Noise to generate obstacles.

title: Login/Register Page
description: Simple login/register page written using Ruby on Rails. You can also change password when logged in, 'forgot password' which will generate token that can be used to change password as well.

title: Shipment/Discount calculator
description: Written with Java. Given a list of dates, sizes, and providers of shipment a price with a discount will be calculated according to chosen rules. Rules and more info can be found in the GitHub repository.

title: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
description: Written using Java and using JavaFX for UI. Visualizes sorting one of three implemented sorting algorithms. Change sample size, sorting speed, pause/resume sorting.

title: Connect Dots Mobile Game
description: Mobile game made on Unity. Press on the dots in the correct order, connect them all!
